sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛First name, 

We regretfully inform you that your application for Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Requested Dog has not been approved. 

If you want to try adopting a different dog please submit a new application.   We have plenty of pups that need a family and we do not doubt that you can find a new addition to your family. 

Sincerely, 

Pound Puppies

Hi, Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛First name, 

We are happy to inform you that you can welcome your new pup into your family! 

Please contact us to schedule a time to pick up your pup within the next week.  We will also provide a care package to help your dog successfully transition to its new home. 

 

Sincerely, 

Pound Puppies
